pochemon.name: Bulbasaur
pochemon.description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokemon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

pochemon.name: Charmander
pochemon.description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

pochemon.name: Squirtle
pochemon.description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.
